argument.description: A numeric value whose remainder you wish to find.
The number used to divide into n.

description: The PostgreSQL mod function returns the remainder of n divided by m.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT mod(12, 5);
 mod
-----
   2
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT mod(12, 0.18);
 mod
------
 0.12
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT mod(100, 3.5938);
  mod
--------
2.9674
(1 row)
